edit_script:
<actions>
  <update-node tree="member_expression: error == ECDSAUpgradeable.RecoverError.NoError [1352,1398]" label="error <= ECDSAUpgradeable.RecoverError.NoError" />
  <update-node tree="logical_operator: && [1399,1401]" label="||" />
  <update-node tree="member_expression: success && result.length == 32 && abi.decode(result, (bytes4)) == IERC1271Upgradeable.isValidSignature.selector [1652,1763]" label="success || result.length == 32 && abi.decode(result, (bytes4)) == IERC1271Upgradeable.isValidSignature.selector" />
  <update-node tree="comparison_operator: == [1412,1414]" label="<=" />
</actions>
